long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extention allows you to input a time in seconds. And the extention will reload the css of the page WITHOUT reload the html in any way.

It also shoudn't flash the page when reload occurs. it should be a smooth experience.

This Extention is meant for developers.
